messages.message: ibtools can do that, but only returns a list of strings for the INPUT_COL for each page. Koala does exactly this, but is still experimental.

btw this UDF in Koala is just

```def ibocr_pages(ibocr_record:IBOCRRecord):
    doc = KoalaDocument.from_ibocr_record(ibocr_record)
    pages = doc.get_pages()
    records = [page.to_record() for page in pages if page.search('some\spattern', regex=True)]
    return records```
